Enter New Group name here, must be unique, any non alphanumeric characters will be stripped out upon save. Any group begining with a number 'Pro' will be prefixed to it, to allow css to work correctly.
Make this a table of contents type menu. (note: Only one menu group can use this).

Highlight any menu item that has not been built using Promenu, This will activate any Menu and its parent items, if the URL's match. (mainly will be used for links created inside blocks)

can lead to extremely long opening and closing times
You need to select a Content Page from the drop down.

Change the behavior how the menu bar act. Hover: selecting hover all menus open on mouse over and close on mouse leave. Click: The menu bar opens and close's on a click and the sub menu's and their descendants are opened by hovering. IMPORTANT: This option deactivates the main parent menu links (Main Parent Menu's without Subs are unaffected)
If yes, this menu will query and build a list of your forums and their children

This box is to be used for any additional class, style, attribute you want to add to this menu item. It will only effect this menu item. use class="<example>" to add a class, use style="<example>" to add a style, for any additonal attributes, properly format them. if you want the description or the title for the menu item to display in a tooltip or title box, do the following: title="{promenu_title}" or data-tooltip="{promenu_title}", for descriptions, title="{promenu_desc}" or data-tooltip="{promenu_desc}".
If yes, this menu will query and build a list of categories for this database.

Select which installed application menu can be linked to. If the application is disabled or the tab is hidden in the application and modules section, the application might not be directly accessible from the front end. Promenu itself will not show up in this list.

Your site in multiple languages? Enabling this setting will allow you to add multiple titles to the menus, and will read the site default or users current language set to display the appropriate name of the menu
Group %s has been exported as hook
